summary.goal: One-shot login + secrets broker + audited access for Archon-X

demoCommands: python cli/archonxctl/main.py secrets upload --file ops/demo/demo-secrets.json --principal pauli --work-item-id WI-DEMO-1001
python cli/archonxctl/main.py grants request --principal pauli --principal-type human --resource github --action write --duration 30 --work-item-id WI-DEMO-1001
python cli/archonxctl/main.py grants approve --grant-id <id> --approver admin --work-item-id WI-DEMO-1001

testsRun.name: CLI login + secret upload + grant request/approve + audit export

knownGaps: Docker daemon unavailable on this host during validation; compose startup could not be runtime-verified here.
Linux bash unavailable on this Windows host; bash scripts created but runtime verification used .ps1 equivalents.
executiveusa/agent-zero could not be cloned (SSH denied, HTTPS repo not found); integration applied to local agent-zero-Fork.
OIDC Device Code flow is scaffold-ready via contract but demo currently uses mock login endpoint.
SCIM/SIEM production integrations are not yet implemented (planned hardening step).
nextHardening: Wire real OIDC Device Code against Entra/Okta
Replace env master key fallback with KMS/HSM
Add signed tamper-evident audit chain and SIEM sink
Add SCIM provisioning and stronger role models
Add full k8s Helm chart and secret management integration
